item.title: Hello world!
item.description: My name is Tomàs Ortega, and I am an Electrical Engineering PhD student at the University of California, Irvine. You can check out my Github here and my CV here.
item.content:
My name is Tomàs Ortega, and I am an Electrical Engineering PhD student at the University of California, Irvine.

You can check out my Github here and my CV here.
